Okay, I need to summarize this document about MSLGROUP in 3-5 sentences. Let me start by reading through the content carefully.

The document introduces MSLGROUP as a PR network under Publicis Groupe, formed by merging Publicis Consultants and Manning Selvage & Lee. They offer various services like PR, financial communications, and social media marketing. The history section mentions their acquisitions over the years, expanding globally. There's info on their rankings, like being 7th in 2021. Then there's a section on recognition, including awards. The controversies part talks about Qorvis working with Saudi Arabia despite human rights issues.

So the main points are: MSLGROUP's origin, services, global presence, acquisitions, rankings, and the controversy with Saudi Arabia. I need to condense this into a concise summary. Make sure to mention the parent company, services, expansion through acquisitions, rankings, and the controversy. Avoid too many details but hit the key concepts. Check for the main topic, which is the company's overview, structure, and notable aspects. Let me structure each sentence to cover these elements without getting too detailed.
</think>

MSLGROUP is a global public relations network under Publicis Groupe, specializing in strategic communications, financial PR, experiential marketing, and social media, formed by merging Publicis Consultants and Manning Selvage & Lee. It has expanded through numerous acquisitions, operating in 40 countries with over 100 offices and 2,000 employees, and was ranked 7th globally in PR revenue by The Holmes Report in 2021. The company has faced controversy for its long-term work with Saudi Arabia amid human rights concerns, particularly through its Qorvis division. MSLGROUP has also received industry recognition, including awards for workplace excellence.

[S1] MSLGROUP


# MSLGROUP



**MSLGROUP** is a public relations (PR) network of companies. [S2] Specialists in strategic communications and engagement, the company is part of the French multinational Publicis Groupe. [S3] It evolved as a merger of Publicis Consultants and Manning Selvage & Lee (thus, the "MSL" in the name). [S4] MSL offers the following services: public relations, financial communications, experiential marketing, live event management, healthcare communications, public affairs, reputation management and social media marketing. [S5] In 2021, public relations analyst firm The Holmes Report ranked MSLGROUP as the seventh largest PR agency in the world, by revenue. [S6] MSLGROUP has over 100 offices in 40 countries, and employs 2,000 people (as of February 2022). [S7] ## History

In 1980, MS&L was acquired by the Benton & Bowles, Inc. [S8] ad agency, who ended up merging with the Leo Burnett ad agency before the entire group was bought by France's Publicis Groupe, to form the world's fourth largest communications company. [S9] In October 2010, MSLGROUP acquired 20:20, an Indian public relations firm specializing in technology and social media. [S10] In November, it acquired Eastwei Relations, now integrated into MSL China. [S11] In December, Publicis Groupe announced a majority stake in Brazilian PR agency Andreoli MS&L to align under MSLGROUP. [S12] In 2011, MSLGROUP made four acquisitions: Taiwan-based Interactive Communications Ltd (ICL), Genedigi Group, technology PR agency Schwartz Communications, and Ciszewski Public Relations, Poland's largest independent public relations agency. [S13] Schwartz Communications was renamed Schwartz MSL. [S14] In 2012, MSLGROUP acquired two marketing firms: King Harvests and Luminous Experiential. [S15] In July, CNC Communications became part of MSLGROUP after Publicis Groupe acquired it. [S16] In August 2013, Brazilian digital and social media marketing agency Espalhe joined MSLGROUP when Publicis Groupe acquired a majority stake in it. [S17] In January 2014, Publicis Groupe acquired 100% stake in Washington D.C.–based Qorvis Communications to become a part of MSLGROUP. [S18] In June, Publicis Consultants MARC joined MSLGROUP, the agency operates under the name Publicis Consultants MSLGROUP, as part of Publicis Groupe Sofia – the Bulgarian unit of Publicis Groupe. [S19] In July, Publicis Groupe acquired UK based sustainability firm Salterbaxter, the agency operates as Salterbaxter MSLGROUP. [S20] In September, Romanian PR agency, The Practice joined MSLGROUP. [S21] The agency now operates under the name MSLGROUP The Practice. [S22] In October, LiveCOM Slovenia joined MSLGROUP to operate under the name LiveCOM MSLGROUP, as part of Publicis Groupe Slovenia. [S23] In November, Capital MSL and Communications Networking Consulting (CNC) two communications consultancies within the MSLGROUP network merged. [S24] The new entity retained the CNC name and began operations on 1 January 2015. [S25] Also in 2014, Schwartz MSL was completely absorbed into MSLGroup. [S26] In February 2015, Publicis Groupe acquired South Africa based communications agency, Epic Communications which initially began to operate as Epic MSLGROUP. [S27] The agency has since dropped “Epic” from its name and now trades simply as “MSL” in South Africa.
